titleStmt.title: The confession of faith, together with the larger and lesser catechismes. Composed by the reverend Assembly of Divines, sitting at Westminster, presented to both Houses of Parliament. Again published with the Scriptures at large, and the emphasis of the Scriptures in a different character. To which is annexed two sheets of Church-government with the Scriptures at large.
Westminster Confession of Faith.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by E.M. for the Company of Stationers, and are to be sold by John Rothwel at the Fountain in Cheapside,

notesStmt.note: Despite numerous errors in pagination, text is continuous.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
